titleStmt.title: Whereas by several proclamations issued from this board, all persons of the popish religion in this kingdom who had or kept any halberts, pikes, musquets, calivers, fowling pieces, carbins, pistols, or other guns whatsoever without licence from the lord lieutenant ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Took and John Crook ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 7 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin the 29th. day of November, 1680"--leaf [4]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
